Package com.github.antzGames.gdx.ode4j.ode.internal.cpp4j.java

Class DoubleArray

java.lang.Object
com.github.antzGames.gdx.ode4j.ode.internal.cpp4j.java.DoubleArray
public class DoubleArray extends Object
Class to simulate pointer operations on double arrays.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DoubleArray(double[] array)
    Create a new DoubleArray referencing the given double array.
    DoubleArray(double[] array, int ofs)
    Create a new DoubleArray referencing the given double array.
    DoubleArray(int size)
     
    DoubleArray(DoubleArray array)
    Create a new DoubleArray referencing the same DoubleArray referenced by the argument.
    DoubleArray(DoubleArray array, int ofs)
    Create a new DoubleArray referencing the same DoubleArray referenced by the argument, starting at the given offset.
